snippet: Lance Gilman, who was elected to the Storey County Board of Commissioners in Nevada, is one of a new breed of legal brothel owners who are not afraid of publicity.
abstract: Sparks Journal; Lance Gilman, who was elected to Storey County Board of Commissioners in Nevada, is one of new breed of legal brothel owners who are not afraid of publicity; he is believed to be the first brothel owner to be elected to public office in state, and his run has caused anxiety for some in the legal sex industry.
lead_paragraph: Lance Gilman, who was elected to the Storey County Board of Commissioners in Nevada, is one of a new breed of legal brothel owners who are not afraid of publicity.

headline.seo: Nevada Brothel Owner Joining County Commission
headline.main: Brothel Owner Raises Profile With Election Victory
headline.print_headline: Brothel Owner Raises Profile With Election Victory
